OpForSpecList.description:
The Archon has recognized this pilot as a famed killer of FedRats. Gain reputation with the Lyrans from contracts against the Federated Suns, and recieve 10% off in Lyran stores.
10% Called Shot Bonus against Federated Suns targets.

Description.Name: Lyran: Suns Hater
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting the Federated Suns, and has a 10% Called Shot Bonus against their forces.

Description.Name: Lyran: Suns Hater
Description.Details: 10% Called Shot bonus

OpForSpecList.description:
The First Prince has recognized this pilot as a famed killer of Lyran scum. Gain reputation with the FedSuns from contracts against the Lyran Alliance, and recieve 10% off in Davion stores.
10% Called Shot Bonus against Lyran targets.

Description.Name: FedSuns: Lyrans Hater
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting the Lyrans, and has a 10% Called Shot Bonus against their forces.

Description.Name: FedSuns: Lyrans Hater
Description.Details: 10% Called Shot bonus

OpForSpecList.OpForSpecName: Free Worlds League: SAFEty Isn't Guaranteed
OpForSpecList.description:
This pilot has made a name for themself against the self-righteous FWL and Knights of the Inner Sphere. Gain reputation with the Marian Hegemony and the Circinus Federation from contracts against the Free Worlds League.
10% Called Shot Bonus against FWL targets.

Description.Name: Hater: FWL
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting the FWL, and has a 10% Called Shot Bonus against their forces.

Description.Name: Hater: FWL
Description.Details: 10% Called Shot bonus

OpForSpecList.OpForSpecName: Draconis Combine: The Way of Bushido
OpForSpecList.description:
The Coordinator himself has begrudgingly recognized this pilot's martial prowess. Lose less reputation when taking contracts against the Draconis Combine and get 10% better selling prices in their stores.
10% Called Shot Bonus against Draconis Combine targets.

Description.Name: Grudging Respect: Kurita
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting the Draconis Combine, and has a 10% Called Shot Bonus against their forces.

Description.Name: Grudging Respect: Kurita
Description.Details: 10% Called Shot bonus

OpForSpecList.description:
Nobody likes Capellans. Gain reputation with the other four Great Houses when taking contracts against the Capellan Confederation.
10% Called Shot Bonus against Capellan targets.

Description.Name: Hater: Capellans
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting the Capellans, and has a 10% Called Shot Bonus against their forces.

Description.Name: Hater: Capellans
Description.Details: 10% Called Shot bonus

OpForSpecList.description:
Nobody likes paying their HPG bills. Gain reputation with all five Great Houses when taking contracts against ComStar.
10% Called Shot Bonus against ComStar targets.

Description.Name: Hater: ComStar
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting ComStar, and has a 10% Called Shot Bonus against their forces.

Description.Name: Hater: ComStar
Description.Details: 10% Called Shot bonus

OpForSpecList.OpForSpecName: Magistracy Of Canopus: Breaking the Trinity
OpForSpecList.description:
Some very interesting 'toys' tend to fall off the back of Canopian trucks. Take a 10% discount when buying and get 10% better prices when selling at the black market.
10% Called Shot Bonus against Canopian targets.

Description.Name: Hater: Canopus
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting the Canopians, and has a 10% Called Shot Bonus against their forces.

Description.Name: Hater: Canopus
Description.Details: 10% Called Shot bonus

OpForSpecList.description:
This pilot has made some connections with factions that are sick of hearing Taurians harp on about 'freedom'. Get a ¢10000 cash bounty for every Taurian unit the company destroys.
10% Called Shot Bonus against Taurian targets.

Description.Name: Hater: Taurian
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting the Taurians, and has a 10% Called Shot Bonus against their forces.

Description.Name: Hater: Taurian
Description.Details: 10% Called Shot bonus

OpForSpecList.description:
The only thing worse than slavers are slavers wearing leather skirts pretending to be the salvation of civilization. Get bonus reputation with ComStar and your employer when taking contracts against the Marian Hegemony.
10% Called Shot Bonus against Marian targets.

Description.Name: Hater: Marian Hegemony
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting the Marian Hegemony, and has a 10% Called Shot Bonus against their forces.

Description.Name: Hater: Marian Hegemony
Description.Details: 10% Called Shot bonus

OpForSpecList.description:
Rumors swirl around the Niops Association, a periphery power that lurks in the shadows. Get bonus reputation with ComStar and your employer when taking contracts against the Niops Association.
10% Called Shot Bonus against Niops targets.

Description.Name: Hater: Niops
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting the Niops Association, and has a 10% Called Shot Bonus against their forces.

Description.Name: Hater: Niops
Description.Details: 10% Called Shot bonus

OpForSpecList.description:
Some folks are just born to be in chains. Get bonus reputation with the Tortuga Dominions when taking contracts against the Outworlds Alliance and get 12% better prices when selling in Tortugan stores.
10% Called Shot Bonus against Outworlds targets.

Description.Name: Hater: Outworlds
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting the Outworlds, and has a 10% Called Shot Bonus against their forces.

Description.Name: Hater: Outworlds
Description.Details: 10% Called Shot bonus

OpForSpecList.OpForSpecName: Free Rasalhague Republic: Give Us Back Our Worlds
OpForSpecList.description:
About the only thing the Lyrans and the Kuritans agree on is that the Free Rasalhague Republic shouldn't exist. Gain reputation with the Combine and the Lyran Alliance when taking contracts against the FRR.
10% Called Shot Bonus against Rasalhague targets.

Description.Name: Hater: Rasalhague
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting the FWL, and has a 10% Called Shot Bonus against their forces.

Description.Name: Hater: Rasalhague
Description.Details: 10% Called Shot bonus

OpForSpecList.description:
Kamea is nothing but an entitled brat throwing a temper tantrum because she lost her palace. The local governments of the Reach will pay you a cash bonus for contracts against the Aurigan Restoration.
10% Called Shot Bonus against Aurigan Restoration targets.

Description.Name: Hater: Aurigan Restoration
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting the Aurigan Restoration, and has a 10% Called Shot Bonus against their forces.

Description.Name: Hater: Aurigan Restoration
Description.Details: 10% Called Shot bonus

OpForSpecList.description:
Kamea is a beacon of hope for the oppressed peoples of the Reach. Gain bonus reputation with the Restoration when taking contracts against the Directorate.
10% Called Shot Bonus against Aurigan Directorate targets.

Description.Name: Hater: Aurigan Directorate
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting the Aurigan Directorate, and has a 10% Called Shot Bonus against their forces.

Description.Name: Hater: Aurigan Directorate
Description.Details: 10% Called Shot bonus

OpForSpecList.OpForSpecName: Rim Collection: Amaris or Am I Wrong
OpForSpecList.description:
The remnants of the Rim Worlds Republic are not to be trusted, even 300 years later. Gain reputation with Comstar when taking contracts against the Rim Collection and a 10% discount from ComStar stores.
10% Called Shot Bonus against Rim Collection targets.

Description.Name: Hater: Rim Collection
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting the Rim Collection, and has a 10% Called Shot Bonus against their forces.

Description.Name: Hater: Rim Collection
Description.Details: 10% Called Shot bonus

OpForSpecList.OpForSpecName: Circinus Federation: Order To the Chaos
OpForSpecList.description:
This pilot has taken to bringing some order to the chaos of the anti-spinward Periphery. Gain reputation with the FWL when taking contracts against the Circinus Federation. Also get a 10% discount in stores belonging to the Marian Hegemony.
10% Called Shot Bonus against Circinus Federation targets.

Description.Name: Hater: Circinus Federation
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting the Circinus Federation, and has a 10% Called Shot Bonus against their forces.

Description.Name: Hater: Circinus Federation
Description.Details: 10% Called Shot bonus

OpForSpecList.description:
Someone clever once said piracy doesn't pay. Piracy might not, but bounties sure do. Gain bonus cash when taking contracts against the Tortuga Dominions.
10% Called Shot Bonus against Tortugan targets.

Description.Name: Hater: Tortugans
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting the Tortugans, and has a 10% Called Shot Bonus against their forces.

Description.Name: Hater: Tortugans
Description.Details: 10% Called Shot bonus

OpForSpecList.description:
Someone clever once said piracy doesn't pay. Piracy might not, but bounties sure do. Gain bonus cash when taking contracts against the Aurigan Pirates and a ¢2500 cash bounty for every pirate killed.
10% Called Shot Bonus against Aurigan Pirate targets.

Description.Name: Hater: Aurigan Pirates
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting Aurigan Pirates, and has a 10% Called Shot Bonus against their forces.

Description.Name: Hater: Aurigan Pirates
Description.Details: 10% Called Shot bonus

OpForSpecList.description:
Rule 125: You can't make a deal if you're dead. Get a 25% discount when buying from the Hanseatic League.
10% Called Shot Bonus against JarnFolk targets.

Description.Name: Hater: JarnFolk
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting the FWL, and has a 10% Called Shot Bonus against their forces.

Description.Name: Hater: JarnFolk
Description.Details: 10% Called Shot bonus

OpForSpecList.description:
Rule 125: You can't make a deal if you're dead. Get a 20% discount when buying from the JarnFolk and a 10% discount from the Lyrans.
10% Called Shot Bonus against Hanseatic League targets.

Description.Name: Hater: Hanseatic League
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting the Hanseatic League, and has a 10% Called Shot Bonus against their forces.

Description.Name: Hater: Hanseatic League
Description.Details: 10% Called Shot bonus

OpForSpecList.description:
The awful thing about the Chainelane Isles is the constant chaos and infighting. The great thing about the Chainelane Isles is the constant chaos and infighting. Get a 10% better prices when buying and selling in the Chainelane Isles. Also get bonus reputation from the Chainelane Isles when fighting the Chainelane Isles.
10% Called Shot Bonus against Chainelane targets.

Description.Name: Hater: Chainelane Isles
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting the Chainelane Isles, and has a 10% Called Shot Bonus against their forces.

Description.Name: Hater: Chainelane Isles
Description.Details: 10% Called Shot bonus

OpForSpecList.description:
Local governments are shortsighted, greedy, and frequently need to be reigned in. Gain extra reputation with your employer when taking contracts against the Locals if your employer is also the system owner.
10% Called Shot Bonus against Local targets.

Description.Name: Hater: Locals
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting locals, and has a 10% Called Shot Bonus against their forces.

Description.Name: Hater: Locals
Description.Details: 10% Called Shot bonus

OpForSpecList.description: This pilot is an expert at fighting Clanners. Repeated succcesses result in gaining bonus reputation and a 10% discount from Inner Sphere factions, as well as a 10% Called Shot Bonus against all Clan forces.

Description.Name: Hater: Clans
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting the Clans, and receives a 10% Called Shot Bonus against all Clan forces.

Description.Name: Hater: Clans Called Shot Bonus
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting the Clans, and receives a 10% Called Shot Bonus against all Clan forces.

OpForSpecList.OpForSpecName: Clan Free Guilds: Down With the Surats
OpForSpecList.description: This pilot is an expert at fighting the Clan Free Guilds. Repeated succcesses result in gaining bonus reputation and a 10% discount from the Clans and House Kurita, as well as a 10% Called Shot Bonus against Clan Free Guild forces.

Description.Name: Hater: Clan Free Guilds
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting the Clan Free Guilds, and receives a 10% Called Shot Bonus against all Clan forces.

Description.Name: Hater: Clan Free Guilds Called Shot Bonus
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting the Clan Free Guilds, and receives a 10% Called Shot Bonus against all Clan forces.

OpForSpecList.OpForSpecName: Word of Blake: Suffer Not Blakist Fanatics to Live
OpForSpecList.description: This pilot is an expert at fighting Blakist fanatics. Repeated succcesses result in gaining bonus reputation and a 10% discount from all major factions, as well as a 10% Called Shot Bonus against all Clan forces.

Description.Name: Hater: Blakist Fanatics
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting Blakist fanatics, and receives a 10% Called Shot Bonus against all Clan forces.

Description.Name: Hater: Blakist Fanatics Called Shot Bonus
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting Blakist fanatics, and receives a 10% Called Shot Bonus against all Clan forces.

OpForSpecList.description: This pilot is an expert at fighting Clan Nova Cat, and receives a 10% Called Shot Bonus against all Clan forces.

Description.Name: Hater: Nova Cat
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting Clan Nova Cat, and receives a 10% Called Shot Bonus against all Clan forces.

Description.Name: Hater: Nova Cat Called Shot Bonus
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting Clan Nova Cat, and receives a 10% Called Shot Bonus against all Clan forces.

MissionSpecList.MissionSpecName: Simple Battle: They Were Coming Right At Me!
MissionSpecList.description: This pilot enjoys a straight-up fight and has +3 accuracy during Simple Battle contracts.

Description.Name: Accuracy Increased
Description.Details: This pilot enjoys a straight-up fight and has +3 accuracy during Simple Battle contracts.

MissionSpecList.description: Other forces in Three-Way Battles deal 10% increased damage to eachother.

Description.Name: Three-Way Damage
Description.Details: Other forces in Three-Way Battles deal 10% increased damage to eachother.

Description.Name: Damage Increased
Description.Details: Other forces in Three-Way Battles deal 10% increased damage to eachother.

MissionSpecList.description: This pilot deals 20% extra damage to the primary Assassinate target.

Description.Name: Assassin Damage
Description.Details: This pilot deals 20% extra damage to the primary Assassinate target.

Description.Name: Damage Increased
Description.Details: This pilot deals 20% extra damage to the primary Assassinate target.

MissionSpecList.description: This pilot is a Master Duelist, and gains +3 accuracy during Solo Duels.

Description.Name: Accuracy Increased
Description.Details: This pilot is a Master Duelist, and gains +3 accuracy during Solo Duels.

MissionSpecList.description: This pilot is a Master Duelist, and gains +3 accuracy during Duo Duels.

Description.Name: Accuracy Increased
Description.Details: This pilot is a Master Duelist, and gains +3 accuracy during Duo Duels.

MissionSpecList.description: This pilot deals 10% extra damage to turrets.

Description.Name: Turret Damage Increased
Description.Details: This pilot deals 10% extra damage to turrets.

Description.Name: Turret Damage Increased
Description.Details: This pilot deals 10% extra damage to turrets.

MissionSpecList.description: This pilot deals 20% extra damage to buildings.

Description.Name: Building Damage Increased
Description.Details: This pilot deals 20% extra damage to buildings.

Description.Name: Damage Increased
Description.Details: This pilot deals 20% extra damage to buildings

Description.Name: Building Damage Increased
Description.Details: Friendly building damage reduced by 20%.

Description.Name: Damage Decreased
Description.Details: Friendly building damage reduced by 20%.

MissionSpecList.description: Friendly building damage reduced by 10% and damage dealt to enemy buildings increased by 10%.

Description.Name: Building Damage Increased
Description.Details: Friendly building damage reduced by 10%.

Description.Name: Damage Decreased
Description.Details: Friendly building damage reduced by 10%.

Description.Name: Building Damage Increased
Description.Details: This pilot deals 10% extra damage to buildings.

Description.Name: Damage Increased
Description.Details: This pilot deals 10% extra damage to buildings

MissionSpecList.description: This pilot is an expert as escorting other units and keeping them out of harms way. Allies take 15% less damage.

Description.Name: Damage Resistance
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert as escorting other units and keeping them out of harms way. Allies take 15% less damage.

MissionSpecList.description: This pilot deals 25% extra damage to vehicles during Ambush Convoy missions.

Description.Name: Convoy Ambush Damage
Description.Details: This pilot deals 25% extra damage to vehicles during Ambush Convoy missions.

Description.Name: Convoy Ambush Damage
Description.Details: This pilot deals 25% extra damage to vehicles during Ambush Convoy missions.

MissionSpecList.MissionSpecName: Target Acquisition: Welcome to the Race Track
MissionSpecList.description: This pilot is extra speedy when it counts. 60 meters added to walk/run/jump distance during Target Acquisition contracts.

Description.Name: Boosted Speed
Description.Details: This pilot is extra speedy when it counts. 60 meters added to walk/run distance during Target Acquisition contracts.

Description.Name: Boosted Jump
Description.Details: This pilot is extra speedy when it counts. 60 meters added to jump distance during Target Acquisition contracts.

MissionSpecList.description: This pilot is extra speedy when it counts. 60 meters added to walk/run/jump distance during Rescue/Recovery contracts.

Description.Name: Boosted Speed
Description.Details: This pilot is extra speedy when it counts. 60 meters added to walk/run distance during Rescue/Recovery contracts.

Description.Name: Boosted Jump
Description.Details: This pilot is extra speedy when it counts. 60 meters added to jump distance during Rescue/Recovery contracts.

MissionSpecList.description: They didn't use to pay us enough for this. Well...now they do.

OpForDefaultList.description: This pilot inflicts increased damage against {faction}.

Description.Name: Increased Damage
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at killing the target faction, and deals 20% increased damage to them.

Description.Name: Increased Damage
Description.Details: This pilot inflicts 20% damage against the target faction.

OpForDefaultList.description: This pilot is an expert at fighting {faction}, and takes decreased damage from them.

Description.Name: Increased Damage
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting the target faction, and takes 10% decreased damage from them.

Description.Name: Damage Resist
Description.Details: This pilot is an expert at fighting the target faction, and takes 10% decreased damage from them.

MissionDefaultList.description: This pilot takes less damage during {contract} contracts.

Description.Name: Damage Resistance
Description.Details: This pilot takes 20% less damage during certain contracts.

MissionDefaultList.description: This pilot deals 10% increased damage during {contract} contracts.

Description.Name: Increased Damage
Description.Details: This pilot deals increased damage during certain contracts.

StratComs.description: The commander is sitting this contract out, providing strategic command over the battle. Resolve generation is increased.

Description.Details: The commander is sitting this contract out, providing strategic command over the battle. Resolve generation is increased.

StratComs.description: The commander is sitting this contract out, providing strategic command over the battle. Lance accuracy is increased.
